wizard.container: bg-zinc-900/50 border border-zinc-800 rounded-xl p-8 backdrop-blur-sm

file_upload.zone: border-2 border-dashed border-zinc-700 rounded-xl p-12 text-center hover:border-primary hover:bg-zinc-900/50 transition-all cursor-pointer group relative overflow-hidden
file_upload.icon: w-12 h-12 text-zinc-500 group-hover:text-primary transition-colors mb-4

data_table.header: bg-zinc-900/50 text-zinc-400 text-xs uppercase tracking-wider font-medium border-b border-zinc-800

validation_badge.valid: bg-emerald-500/10 text-emerald-500 border border-emerald-500/20 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs font-medium
validation_badge.warning: bg-amber-500/10 text-amber-500 border border-amber-500/20 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs font-medium
validation_badge.error: bg-red-500/10 text-red-500 border border-red-500/20 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs font-medium

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-colors
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-colors
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-colors
buttons.destructive: bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground hover:bg-destructive/90 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-colors

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE TAILWIND CONFIG: Modify `tailwind.config.ts` to include the new color palette (Zinc-based dark mode) and the specific `apt` (Green) and `hospi` (Red) colors. Add `Manrope` and `IBM Plex Sans` to font families.
2. UPDATE GLOBALS.CSS: Replace the light mode CSS with the dark mode variables defined in `colors` section. Ensure `@layer base` sets the default background to `#09090B` and text to `#FAFAFA`.
3. CREATE LAYOUT WRAPPER: Ensure the main layout handles the division switching logic (applying a class or context) to toggle between APT and Hospi themes (mainly affecting primary/accent colors).
4. BUILD IMPORT WIZARD: Create a 4-step wizard component. Use the `wizard` styles defined. State management should handle the file data through all 4 stages.

5. IMPLEMENT DATA TABLE: Build a reusable data table component that supports validation status. Use `tanstack/react-table` if available or build a custom one using the `data_table` styles. It must handle 'valid', 'warning', and 'error' states for rows/cells.
6. DRAG & DROP: Implement `react-dropzone` for the file upload stage using the `file_upload` styles.
7. CONFLICT RESOLUTION: Create a specific UI for Stage 2 (Validation) where users can see side-by-side comparisons for duplicates or dropdowns for category assignment.
8. REVIEW SCREEN: Stage 4 should be a summary screen with 'Commit' and 'Cancel' actions.
9. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure all inputs have labels, colors meet contrast ratios (check against Zinc-900), and interactive elements have focus states.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: `transition: all`. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add `.App { text-align: center; }` in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§ ðŸ’­ðŸ’¡ðŸ”®ðŸŽ¯ðŸ“š etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories (especially sponsor logos) = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Create new components that match the style and conventions of existing components when needed
Examine existing components to understand the project's component patterns before creating new ones
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
Use `sonner` for toasts. Sonner component are located in `/app/src/components/ui/sonner.tsx`
